title: Life-Saving Days by the Husky’s Side - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai
tags: Abusive Characters   Acting   Black Belly   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Child Abuse   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Friendship   Gamers   Gangs   Human Experimentation   Kidnappings   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Multiple Transported Individuals   Near-Death Experience   Pets   Playful Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Shameless Protagonist   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Strategist   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Wealthy Characters
author: A Lifetime Of Beautiful Clothes   一世华裳
description:
Zhou Li had transmigrated into a tooth-rottingly sweet novel.

The sweet novel tells the story of a tragic male protagonist who was turned into a dog, abused by a gangster, rescued by the heroine, before finally marrying the heroine.

Zhou Li’s fate was pitiful, and he transmigrated into the animal-abusing gangster.

When he transmigrated, he found his foot stepping down on a dog’s head.

Looking at the dying dog, then thinking about the male lead’s character, he realised that his life was held in this little puppy’s paws.>
